languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, вы, возможно, без любви относитесь ко мне. И с организацией, к которой я принадлежу, у вас {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}не сложилось крепкого союза{/d}. Но если, видя новый порядок Футфола, вы испытываете хотя бы тень подозрения, что это — проклятое безумие, вмешайтесь и помогите мне остановить это".

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, you may have little love to spare for me, and you certainly {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}have not built a strong alliance{/d} with the organisation I represent. But if seeing the new order of things on Footfall gives you even the tiniest suspicion that it's all damned madness, step in and help me stop it."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, вы, возможно, без любви относитесь ко мне. И с организацией, к которой я принадлежу, у вас {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}не сложилось крепкого союза{/d}. Но если, видя новый порядок Футфола, вы испытываете хотя бы тень подозрения, что это — проклятое безумие, вмешайтесь и помогите мне остановить это".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, perhaps you have little love to spare for me. Nor have you built a strong alliance with the organisation I'm a member of. But if looking at the new order of things on Footfall gives you even a tiny suspicion that it's damned madness, step in and help me stop it."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, perhaps you have little love to spare for me. Nor have you built a strong alliance with the organisation I'm a member of. But if looking at the new order of things on Footfall gives you even a tiny suspicion that it's damned madness, step in and help me stop it."

But if looking at the new order of things on Footfall gives you even a tiny suspicion that it's damned madness, step in and help me stop it."

But if seeing the new order of things on Footfall gives you even the tiniest suspicion that it's all damned madness, step in and help me stop it."

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, you may have little love to spare for me, and you certainly {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}have not built a strong alliance{/d} with the organisation I represent. But if seeing the new order of things on Footfall gives you even the tiniest suspicion that it's all damned madness, step in and help me stop it."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “大人，或许您对我没有太多偏爱，与我所在的组织也{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}没有建立牢固的联盟关系{/d}。但当您看到落脚港的新‘秩序’时，哪怕您心里有一丁点怀疑，认为这是一场彻头彻尾的疯狂暴行，那您都应该站出来，帮助我阻止这一切。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, you may have little love to spare for me, and you certainly {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}have not built a strong alliance{/d} with the organisation I represent. But if seeing the new order of things on Footfall gives you even the tiniest suspicion that it's all damned madness, step in and help me stop it."

traits.locale_text: “大人，或许您对我没有太多偏爱，与我所在的组织也没有建立牢固的联盟关系。但当您看到落脚港的新‘秩序’时，只要您有一点点怀疑这是彻头彻尾的疯狂暴行，那您都应该站出来，帮助我阻止这一切。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「陛下、あなたは恐らく私に対して愛情は一切持っていないだろう。私が率いる組織と{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}強い同盟関係を結んだ訳でもない{/d}。だが、フットフォールの現状を見て少しでも狂っているんじゃないかと疑問を抱いたなら、それを止めるための手助けをしてくれ」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, you may have little love to spare for me, and you certainly {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}have not built a strong alliance{/d} with the organisation I represent. But if seeing the new order of things on Footfall gives you even the tiniest suspicion that it's all damned madness, step in and help me stop it."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、あなたは恐らく私に対して愛情は一切持っていないだろう。私が率いる組織と{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}強い同盟関係を結んだ訳でもない{/d}。だが、フットフォールの現状を見て少しでも狂っているんじゃないかと疑問を抱いたなら、それを止めるための手助けをしてくれ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, puede que no me tenga mucho cariño, y es verdad que {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}tampoco ha forjado una alianza fuerte{/d} con la organización a la que pertenezco. Pero si el nuevo orden Paso le parece una locura, intervenga y ayúdeme a pararlo».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, you may have little love to spare for me, and you certainly {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}have not built a strong alliance{/d} with the organisation I represent. But if seeing the new order of things on Footfall gives you even the tiniest suspicion that it's all damned madness, step in and help me stop it."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, quizá le quede un poco de amor para mí. Tampoco ha forjado una alianza fuerte con la organización a la que pertenezco. Viendo las cosas que han transcurrido en Paso, da la ligera sospecha de que es una puta locura. Intervenga y ayúdeme a pararlo».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, Ihr habt vielleicht wenig für mich übrig, und Ihr habt auch gewiss {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}kein starkes Bündnis{/d} mit der Organisation aufgebaut, die ich vertrete. Aber wenn Euch beim Betrachten der neuen Ordnung auf Footfall auch nur der geringste Verdacht kommt, dass das vielleicht verdammter Irrsinn sein könnte, dann schreitet ein und helft mir, dem ein Ende zu setzen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, you may have little love to spare for me, and you certainly {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}have not built a strong alliance{/d} with the organisation I represent. But if seeing the new order of things on Footfall gives you even the tiniest suspicion that it's all damned madness, step in and help me stop it."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, Ihr habt vielleicht wenig für mich übrig. Und Ihr habt auch kein starkes Bündnis mit der Organisation aufgebaut, der ich angehöre. Aber wenn Euch beim Betrachten der neuen Ordnung auf Footfall auch nur der geringste Verdacht kommt, dass das vielleicht verdammter Irrsinn sein könnte, dann schreitet ein und helft mir, dem ein Ende zu setzen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, vous ne me portez pas dans votre cœur et {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}vous n'avez pas noué des liens suffisamment forts{/d} avec l'organisation dont je fais partie. Cependant, si le nouvel ordre qui règne à Castel vous donne ne serait-ce que l'impression de n'être que pure folie, intervenez et aidez-moi à l'endiguer. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, you may have little love to spare for me, and you certainly {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}have not built a strong alliance{/d} with the organisation I represent. But if seeing the new order of things on Footfall gives you even the tiniest suspicion that it's all damned madness, step in and help me stop it."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, je sais que vous ne me portez pas dans votre cœur et que vous n'avez pas noué des liens suffisamment forts avec l'organisation dont je fais partie. Cependant, si le nouvel ordre qui règne à Castel vous donne ne serait-ce que l'impression de n'être que pure folie, intervenez et aidez-moi à l'endiguer. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, beni pek sevmediğinizi biliyorum. Temsilcisi olduğum örgütle de {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}sıkı bir dostluk kurmadığınız{/d} âşikar. Fakat Binliman'daki yeni düzene tanıklık ettikten sonra delilikten öte bir garabetle boğuştuğumuza dair içinize en ufak bir inanç doğduysa şu işe el atın da durduralım."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, you may have little love to spare for me, and you certainly {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}have not built a strong alliance{/d} with the organisation I represent. But if seeing the new order of things on Footfall gives you even the tiniest suspicion that it's all damned madness, step in and help me stop it."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, beni pek sevmediğinizi biliyorum. Temsilcisi olduğum örgütle de {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}sıkı bir dostluk kurmadığınız{/d} âşikar. Fakat Binliman'daki yeni düzene tanıklık ettikten sonra delilikten öte bir garabetle boğuştuğumuza dair içinize en ufak bir inanç doğduysa şu işe el atın da durduralım."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
